name: A Limber Love
description:
You and the one you love are trapped in a cabin. You're out of food, low on firewood, and a winter storm has started outside. What do you do? 

A LIMBER LOVE is a 19k illustrated narrative about transformation, self-determination, and love in an environment of supernatural horror. 

Content note: The story takes place in a severely limiting environment. Themes include deprivation (including of food and warmth), compulsion, environmental desolation, transhumanist evolution, survival under extreme conditions, and spiders. We included narrative options for acceptance of, rejection of, and negotiation with this environment. Please play with caution.

This is also a story about love. Themes include facing the world together, never being as alone as you thought, and reaching for your love to always find them there—even if not always in the form you expected.

You can follow Copper Spines for updates and extras on Twitter and Instagram. If you enjoyed this free story and want to support us in the production of the next, you can toss us a few bucks via the "Support This Game" button above!
